Diagnostic Data send to MS. 0 = Off (Enterprise Only); 1 = Basic
Black Theme (will get reset with user setting)
Prevents sending speech, inking and typing samples to MS (so Cortana can learn to recognise you)
Windows Store Auto Download (2 = always off, 4 = always on, delete = user choice)

No info like "new app x has been installed"
